alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 9:14PM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Snowfall accumulations of 10 to 20 inches have already fallen. Additional snowfall accumulations of 10 to 15 inches are possible with locally higher amounts on the higher peaks. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Thursday. Moderate snow will again break out after midnight tonight, with heavy snow possible Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a tenth of a mile at times. People recreating in the backcountry could become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
